title: Highway Expansion Project
description: Expanding the Harare-Bulawayo highway to improve transportation efficiency and facilitate economic activity.

title: Tokwe Mukosi Dam
description: Construction of a major dam for irrigation, water supply, and promoting climate-resilient agriculture in surrounding communities.

title: Rural Clinic Upgrades
description: Upgrading rural clinics to improve access to quality healthcare services, including maternal and child health, and addressing gender-based violence.

title: Commercial Farming Initiative
description: Supporting commercial farming to boost agricultural output, enhance food security, and create employment opportunities in rural areas.

title: Irrigation System Modernization
description: Modernizing irrigation systems to improve water efficiency, enhance agricultural productivity, and promote sustainable water management practices.

title: Victoria Falls Tourism Project
description: Developing tourism infrastructure at Victoria Falls to attract more visitors, generate revenue, and create employment opportunities in the tourism sector.

title: Mining Sector Expansion
description: Expanding mining operations to increase mineral exports, generate revenue, and contribute to economic growth, while ensuring responsible mining practices.

title: Hwange Power Plant Upgrade
description: Upgrading the Hwange power plant to increase electricity generation capacity, address energy shortages, and support industrial growth.

title: Manufacturing Sector Growth
description: Supporting the manufacturing sector to boost local production, create jobs, and reduce reliance on imports, promoting economic diversification.

title: Beitbridge Border Post Modernization
description: Modernizing the Beitbridge border post to facilitate trade, reduce congestion, and improve efficiency in cross-border movement of goods and people.

title: Lake Mutirikwi Dam Rehabilitation
description: Rehabilitating Lake Mutirikwi Dam to ensure water security for irrigation, domestic use, and industrial purposes, supporting livelihoods in the region.

title: New Maternity Clinics
description: Constructing new maternity clinics and providing essential equipment to reduce maternal mortality rates and improve access to safe delivery services, aligning with the Spotlight Initiative's goals.

title: Smallholder Farming Support
description: Providing support to smallholder farmers through training, access to inputs, and market linkages to increase yields, improve livelihoods, and enhance food security at the household level.

title: Drip Irrigation Systems
description: Implementing drip irrigation systems to conserve water, improve irrigation efficiency, and increase crop yields, promoting sustainable agricultural practices.

title: Great Zimbabwe Tourism
description: Promoting tourism at the Great Zimbabwe monuments to attract more visitors, generate revenue, and preserve cultural heritage, contributing to local economic development.

title: Gold Mining Expansion
description: Expanding gold mining operations to increase revenue, generate employment, and contribute to economic growth, while adhering to environmental regulations and promoting responsible mining practices.

title: Solar Power Plant Construction
description: Constructing new solar power plants to generate clean energy, reduce reliance on fossil fuels, and contribute to a sustainable energy mix, promoting environmental sustainability.

title: Textile Industry Revival
description: Reviving the textile industry to create jobs, boost local production, and reduce reliance on imports, promoting industrial growth and economic diversification.
